title: Horyaalka Premier League: Liverpool ma ilaashan doontaa koobka. Arsenal, Manchester City iyo Chelsea maxaa laga fili karaa? Xog dhamaystiran
text:
Xigashada Sawirka, Rob Newell - CameraSport via Getty Images
Taageerayaasha kubadda cagta adduunka oo dhan ayaa si weyn u sugaya bilowga xilli-ciyaareedka cusub ee horyaalka Premier League ee dalka Ingiriiska 2025–2026, iyadoo la filayo inuu karaar dhaafo xiisaha iyo la yaabkiisaba waana in Premier League-ga loo arko horyaalka ugu xooggan adduunka.
Wareegga koowaad wuxuu noqon doonaa mid kulul, iyadoo xilli-ciyaareedku si rasmi ah u bilaabanayo Jimcahan, 15-ka Agoosto, ciyaar kaliya oo dhexmaraysa Liverpool oo ah kooxda horyaalka difaacanaysa iyo martidooda Bournemouth, garoonka Anfield.
Ciyaaraha wareegga ayaa sii socon doona Sabtida, waxaana ka mid ah kulamo muhiim ah sida Aston Villa oo la ciyaaraysa Newcastle United, Nottingham Forest oo la kulmaysa Brentford, Tottenham oo la baratami doonta Burnley, iyo Wolverhampton oo wajahaysa Manchester City.
Xigashada Sawirka, Rob Newell - CameraSport via Getty Images
Suuqa kala iibsiga xagaaga ee 2025 ayaa galay diiwaan taariikhi ah, iyadoo kooxaha Premier League-ga Ingiriiska (oo dhan 20 koox) ay dhaafeen kharashka laba bilyan oo gini oo Ingiriisi ah oo lagu bixiyay ciyaartoy cusub.
Liverpool oo ah kooxda difaacanaysa horyaalka ayaa sameysay dhowr heshiis oo waaweyn oo ay ku bixiyeen lacago aan caadiyan looga baran kooxdan kuwaasoo guud ahaan gaadhaya ku dhowaad £300 milyan. Heshiiska ugu weyn wuxuu ahaa keenista weeraryahanka Jarmalka ah Florian Wirtz oo laga soo gatay Bayer Leverkusen, waxaana lagu bixiyay £116.5 milyan (oo ay ku jiraan gunnooyin), taasoo ka dhigtay mid ka mid ah heshiisyadii ugu qaalisanaa taariikhda Ingiriiska, iyo tan ugu qaalisan suuqa caalamka kahor bilowga xilli-ciyaareedka cusub.
Kooxda horyaalka Premier League difaacanaysa ayaa sidoo kale la soo wareegtay weeraryahanka Faransiiska ah Hugo Ekitike oo ka yimid kooxda Eintracht Frankfurt ee dalka Jarmalka, iyo sidoo kale daafaca bidixda ka ciyaara ee Hungari u dhashay Milos Kerkez, iyo daafaca midig ee Holland u dhashay Jeremie Frimpong, kaas oo noqon doona beddelka Trent Alexander-Arnold oo u wareegay kooxda Real Madrid.
End of Ugu akhris badan
Xigashada Sawirka, Rob Newell - CameraSport via Getty Images
Wariyaha ciyaaraha Maxamed Amiin Al-Kinaani ayaa BBC-da u sheegay in ku guuleysiga horyaal kasta uu u baahan yahay maalgelin ballaadhan iyo kharash. Wuxuu xusay in bilowgii xilligii tababaraha Jarmalka ahaa ee Jürgen Klopp, Liverpool ay la saxiixatay ciyaartoy caan ah sida Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk, Sadio Mané, iyo Roberto Firmino  kuwaasoo wax badan taray kooxda, maadaama Liverpool ay hanatay horyaalka iyo koobab kale oo badan. Waxaa kaloo jiray xasillooni, maadaama kooxda ay ka soo baxday dhibaatooyinkii ay la tacaalayeen ka hor imaanshihii Klopp.
Al-Kinaani wuxuu intaas ku daray: "Xilli-ciyaareedkii hore wuxuu ahaa xilli gaar ah oo lama ilaawaan ah Liverpool iyo guud ahaan Premier League-ga  ma heli kartid horyaal adigoon si fiican u kharash u bixin."
Wuxuu sidoo kale xusay in Liverpool ay xilli-ciyaareedkii hore faa'iido weyn dhaqaale ka heshay, oo ay ku jirto €200 milyan oo ka timid dakhliga baahinta Premier League-ga, iyo €90 milyan oo laga helay tartanka Champions League kaddib isbedelka nidaamkiisa.
Inkastoo kooxda ay xilli-ciyaareedkan ku bixisay lacago badan si ay u hesho ciyaartoy cusub, haddana waxay sidoo kale iibisay ciyaartoy lagu helay in ka badan €196 milyan  taasoo uu ku tilmaamay tiro aad u fiican, wuxuuna amaan u jeediyay agaasimaha isboortiga ee kooxda.
Kadib xilli-ciyaareed niyad-jab ku ahaa taageerayaasha Manchester City  kaliya ma ahan kuwa Ingiriiska, balse sidoo kale adduunka oo dhan  kooxda waxay hiigsanaysa inay dib u hanato horyaalkii ay waayeen xilli-ciyaareedkii hore oo ay Liverpool qaaday. Tababaraha kooxda, Pep Guardiola, ayaa go'aansaday inuu sameeyo saxiixyo badan si uu u xoojiyo kooxda oo xilli-ciyaareedkii hore muuqatay inaysan gaarin heerkeedii caadiga ahaa.
City ayaa la saxiixatay xiddiga xulka France Rayan Cherki, Rayan Aït-Nouri oo ka yimid Wolverhampton, Tijjani Reijnders oo ka yimid Milan, iyo ciyaaryahanka reer Norway Benjamin Kerke. Waxa kale oo ay keensadeen goolhayaha James Trafford oo kasoo baxay Burnley. Guud ahaan kharashka kooxda ayaa dhaafay £153.4 milyan.
Laakiin ma awoodi doontaa Manchester City inay kasoo kabato guuldarradii xilli-ciyaareedkii hore? Falanqeeyaha ciyaaraha Ahmed Ghoneim ayaa leh: "Dhab ahaantii, Manchester City waxay leedahay dhaxal weyn oo la xidhiidha tababareheeda Pep Guardiola. Tan iyo markii uu tababaraha Isbaanishka ah la wareegay kooxda 2016, kooxda waxay hanatay horyaalka Premier League lix jeer."
Ghoneim wuxuu BBC-da u sheegay: "Waxaan dhihi karnaa xilli-ciyaareedka soo socda wuxuu keeni doonaa nooc cusub oo Manchester City ah, iyadoo ay sabab u yihiin saxiixyada kooxda sameysay  laga bilaabo bishii Janaayo ee lasoo dhaafay ilaa xagaagan  gaar ahaan dhanka weerarka oo lagu xoojiyay keenista Masriyaanka Omar Marmoush iyo Faransiiska Rayan Cherki, iyo sidoo kale bartamaha iyo daafaca oo ay ku biireen Tijjani Reijnders iyo Aljeeriyaanka Rayan Aït-Nouri. Sidaa darteed, Manchester City waxay weli tahay musharax weyn oo u tartami kara horyaalka Premier League, gaar ahaan iyadoo la filayo in saxiixyo kale ay dhici doonaan kahor inta aan la xirin suuqa kala iibsiga."
Ciyaaryahankii hore ee caalamiga ahaa Yasser Al-Shanwani ayaa BBC-da u sheegay: "Xilli-ciyaareedkii hore ee Manchester City wuxuu ahaa musiibo." Wuxuu tilmaamay in falanqeeyaal badan oo Ingiriis ah ay u sababeeyeen hoos u dhaca kooxda dhaawacii xiddiga kooxda Rodri.
Wuxuu intaas ku daray: "Waxaa hadda jira warar sheegaya in City ay diyaar u tahay inay fasaxdo Rodri  arrin la yaab leh  gaar ahaan iyadoo Pep Guardiola uu shaaciyay inuu ka tagi doono xilka tababarenimo marka uu dhammaado qandaraaskiisa kooxda."
Taageerayaasha Arsenal wali waxay ku riyoonayaan hanashada horyaalka Premier League, maadaama markii ugu dambeysay ee kooxda loo yaqaan "Gunners"  ay qaaday horyaalka ay ahayd xilli-ciyaareedkii 2003–2004. Kooxda reer London waxay horyaalka hanatay 13 jeer taariikhdeeda.
Kooxdu, oo uu hoggaaminayo tababaraha Mikel Arteta, waxay dadaal ugu jirtaa inay rumayso riyada taageerayaasheeda. Arsenal waxay sameysay dhowr saxiix muhiim ah kahor bilaabashada xilli-ciyaareedka, kuwaas oo ay ka mid yihiin: Martín Zubimendi oo ka yimid Real Sociedad (Spain), Viktor Gyökeres oo laga keenay Sporting Lisbon (Portugal), Noni Madueke oo laga soo qaatay Chelsea, Cristhian Mosquera oo ka yimid Valencia, iyo goolhayaha Chelsea Kepa Arrizabalaga. Guud ahaan, kooxda waxay ku bixisay  suuqa in ka badan £190 milyan.
Falanqeeyaha ciyaaraha Ahmed Ghoneim ayaa BBC-da u sheegay: "Dabcan, Arsenal way tartami kartaa, sababtoo ah tababaraha kooxda Mikel Arteta hadda ma jiro cudurdaar uu ku difaaco inuusan si dhab ah ugu tartamin hanashada horyaalka Premier League kadib xoojinta weyn ee la sameeyay xagaagan. Tan ugu muhiimsan waxay ahayd xallinta dhibaatada weeraryahanka saxda ah iyadoo la keenay Viktor Gyökeres, kaas oo ahaa tartame xooggan xilli-ciyaareedkii hore si uu u helo abaalmarinta kabta dahabka Yurub. Intaa waxaa dheer, Arsenal waxay xoojisay khadka dhexe iyadoo la wareegtay Martín Zubimendi, iyo sidoo kale inay hayso ciyaartoyda muhiimka ah ee kooxda."
Xigashada Sawirka, Getty Images
Chelsea waxay la tacaashay natiijooyin aan degganayn sannadihii u dambeeyay ee Premier League-ga, balse waxay dad badan ku yaabisay markii ay ku guuleysatay Koobka Adduunka ee Kooxaha ee ugu dambeysay, oo ka dhacay Maraykanka, iyadoo uu hoggaaminayo tababare Enzo Maresca. Kooxdu waxay ku garaacday Paris Saint-Germain ciyaarta kama dambaysta ah, waxayna soo bandhigtay ciyaar xooggan, taasoo sababtay in dad badan ay Chelsea oo loo yaqaan "Blues"ugu saadaaliyaan inay tartan adag ugu jirto horyaalka Premier League.
Markii ugu dambeysay ee Chelsea ay qaaday horyaalka Premier League waxay ahayd xilli-ciyaareedkii 2016–2017, iyadoo uu tababare u ahaa Antonio Conte oo u dhashay Talyaaniga.
Suuqa kala iibsiga xagaaga, Chelsea waxay sii waday istaraatiijiyaddeeda ah inay la soo saxiixato ciyaartoy da'yar, waxaana ay keensatay ciyaartoy ay ka mid yihiin Joao Pedro (Brighton), Liam Delap (Ipswich Town), xiddiga da'da yar ee 18 jirka ah ee reer Brazil Estevão Willian (Palmeiras), iyo Dário Essugo (Sporting Lisbon), iyadoo guud ahaan lagu ku bixisay suuqa ku dhawaad £240.2 milyan.
Ciyaaryahankii hore ee xulka qaranka Sucuudiga, Yasser Alshahrani, ayaa BBC-da u sheegay in Chelsea ay wacdarro ka dhigtay hoos imaatinka tababare Enzo Maresca, kaas oo sida uu sheegay wax weyn ka beddelay qaab ciyaareedkii "Blues". Tani waxay si cad uga muuqatay xilli-ciyaareedkii hore, markay ku guuleysteen UEFA Conference League. Wuxuu sidoo kale xusay in guushii ay ka gaareen Koobka Adduunka ee Kooxaha aysan ahayn mid lala yaabay marka la eego heerka kooxda.
Dhanka kale, falanqeeyaha ciyaaraha Axmed Ghoneim ayaa aaminsan in xaaladda Chelsea hadda aragti ahaan ay ka dhigeyso musharax xooggan oo u tartami kara horyaalka, gaar ahaan kadib guushii ay ka gaareen Koobka Adduunka ee Kooxaha, inkastoo aysan ka mid ahayn kooxaha loo saadaalinayay kahor bilowgii tartanka.
Ghoneim wuxuu intaas ku daray: "Chelsea waxay sameysay xoojino xooggan, waxaana ugu muuqasho weyn Joao Pedro oo noqday lama filaan heer sare ah wareegyadii dambe ee Koobka Kooxaha. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, kooxda waxay weli u baahan tahay xoojino dheeri ah oo dhanka khadka dhexe, daafaca, iyo goolhayaha ah kahor inta uusan xidhmin suuqa xagaaga, haddii ay doonayaan inay si dhab ah ugu tartamaan horyaalka Premier League."
Xigashada Sawirka, Matt McNulty/Getty Images
Ka dib xilliyaal badan oo niyad jab ah oo ay la kulantay horyaalka Premier League, kooxda weyn ee Manchester United waxay suuqa kala iibsiga ku gashay si xooggan iyada oo rejaynaysa inay dib u soo ceshato sharafkeedii lumay. Waa mid ka mid ah kooxaha ugu guulaha badan taariikhda horyaalka Premier League, iyadoo haysata 20 horyaal sida Liverpool.
Kooxda loo yaqaan "Shayaadiinta Cas" waxay sameysay saxiixyo badan oo ay dhaleeceeyayaashu u arkaan kuwo muhiim ah oo xooggan. Waxay la soo saxiixdeen Bryan Mbeumo oo ka yimid Brentford; garabka reer xulka Cameroon ayaa ku biiray kooxda si uu u xoojiyo weerarka.
Manchester United sidoo kale waxay la soo saxiixday Benjamin Sesko oo ka yimid RB Leipzig, halkaas oo weeraryahanka reer Slovenia uu ku biiray si uu u xoojiyo safka hore.
Sidoo kale waxay saxiixeen Matheus Cunha oo ka yimid Wolverhampton, weeraryahanka reer Brazil ayaa ku biiray heshiis loogu talagalay in lagu xoojiyo awooda weerarka. Guud ahaan, Manchester United waxay suuqa ku bixisay ilaa £205.2 milyan.
Saxafiga ciyaaraha Hamza chtioui ayaa BBC-da u sheegay in Manchester United ay weli tahay qayb muhiim ah oo ka mid ah taariikhda kubadda cagta Ingiriiska, gaar ahaan Premier League, inkastoo ay hoos u dhacday natiijooyinkeeda xilliyaashii ugu dambeeyay. Wuxuu sheegay in kaalinta 15-aad ee ay ka galeen xilli ciyaareedkii hore ay ahayd mid gebi ahaanba aan habboonayn United. Wuxuu tilmaamay in dhibaatada kooxda ay tahay mid maamul, maadaama dhibaatooyinkii kooxda ay la kulantay markii uu tababare ahaan joogay Rúben Amorim oo u dhashay Portugal, gaar ahaan muddadii ugu horeysay inkastoo uu natiijooyin wanaagsan ka keenay kooxda Sporting Lisbon, ay weli sii jiraan. Caddeyn ahaan, qaar ka mid ah ciyaartoydii Manchester United ayaa si fiican ugu soo baxay kooxo kale markii ay ka tageen Old Trafford.
Wuxuu sharaxay in maamulka Manchester United uu ku guul darreystay saxiixyo badan oo ciyaartoy ah, wuxuuna xusay in dhibaatooyinka kooxda ay ka weyn yihiin tababaraha keliya. Tani waa wax lagu arkay markii tababarihii hore Erik ten Hag uu sidoo kale ku guul darreystay inkastoo uu guulo ka gaadhay Ajax Amsterdam.
Xigashada Sawirka, James Gill - Danehouse/Getty Images
Ciyaaryahan hore Yaasir Shanuwani wuxuu u sheegay BBC in tartanku uu noqon doono mid aad u xoog badan xilli ciyaareedkan horyaalka Ingiriiska, wuxuuna u arkaa in fursadaha Liverpool oo ah kooxda horyaalka haysta aysan noqon doonin kuwo sida kuwii hore xooggan sababo dhowr ah dartood. Wuxuu sheegay in hoos u dhaca kooxaha waaweyn gaar ahaan Manchester City xilli ciyaareedkii hore uu ka caawiyey kooxda tababare Arne Slot inay ku guuleysato horyaalka.
Yaasir wuxuu rumaysan yahay in maqnaanshaha ciyaartoy badan oo kooxda ka baxay xilli ciyaareedka cusub ay saamayn xun ku yeelan karto, gaar ahaan ka dib markii Darwin Núñez (uu u dhaqaaqay kooxda Al-Hilal ee Sacuudi Carabiya), Luis Díaz (uu u dhaqaaqay Bayern Munich), Trent Alexander-Arnold (uu u dhaqaaqay Real Madrid) iyo geeridii Diogo Jota. Sidoo kale, is waafajinta labadan ciyaaryahan ee cusub, Ekitike iyo Wirtz, oo ku biiray weerarka Mohamed Salah waxay u baahan doontaa waqti.
